tier.item: (1) a. En rebre la teva nota, vaig sortir de la reunió.
in to-receive the your message, left.1SG from the meeting
`When I received your message I left the meeting.'
`Because I received your message, I left the meeting.'
(1) a. En rebre la teva nota, vaig sortir de la reunió.
in to-receive the your message, left.1SG from the meeting
`When I received your message I left the meeting.'
`Because I received your message, I left the meeting.'
En rebre la teva nota, vaig sortir de la reunió.
in to-receive the your message, left.1SG from the meeting
When I received your message I left the meeting.
Because I received your message, I left the meeting.
va desmaiar.1
b. Al veure `m, es
at the to-see me REFL fainted.3SG
`When (s)he saw me, (s)he fainted.'
`Because (s)he saw me, (s)he fainted.'
b. Al veure `m, es va desmaiar.1
at the to-see me REFL fainted.3SG
`When (s)he saw me, (s)he fainted.'
`Because (s)he saw me, (s)he fainted.'

at the to-see me REFL fainted.3SG
When (s)he saw me, (s)he fainted.
Because (s)he saw me, (s)he fainted.
(i) a. En Pere es va desmaiar al veure' m.
the Pere REFL fainted.3SG at the to-see me
`Pere fainted when he saw me.'
`Pere fainted, because he saw me.'

the Pere REFL fainted.3SG at the to-see me

`Pere fainted, because he saw me.'

the Pere REFL fainted.3SG at the to-see me

Pere fainted, because he saw me.
b. En Pere, al veure `m, es va desmaiar.
the Pere, at the to-see me REFL fainted.3SG
`Pere fainted when he saw me.'
`Because he saw me, Peter fainted.'
b. En Pere, al veure `m, es va desmaiar.
the Pere, at the to-see me REFL fainted.3SG
`Pere fainted when he saw me.'
`Because he saw me, Peter fainted.'
En Pere, al veure `m, es va desmaiar.
the Pere, at the to-see me REFL fainted.3SG
Pere fainted when he saw me.

(2) a. La Maria va estornudar mentre tu parlaves.
the Maria sneezed while you spoke
`Maria sneezed while you were speaking.'
(2) a. La Maria va estornudar mentre tu parlaves.
the Maria sneezed while you spoke
`Maria sneezed while you were speaking.'
La Maria va estornudar mentre tu parlaves.
the Maria sneezed while you spoke
Maria sneezed while you were speaking.
b. Quan era petit, va caure al pou.
when was.3SG small, fell.3SG into the well
`When (s)he was a child, (s)he fell into the well.'
b. Quan era petit, va caure al pou.
when was.3SG small, fell.3SG into the well
`When (s)he was a child, (s)he fell into the well.'

when was.3SG small, fell.3SG into the well
When (s)he was a child, (s)he fell into the well.
(3) a. Quan tu parlaves, es mossegava les ungles.
when you spoke REFL bit.3SG the fingernails
`When you were speaking, (s)he was bitting his fingernails.'
(3) a. Quan tu parlaves, es mossegava les ungles.
when you spoke REFL bit.3SG the fingernails
`When you were speaking, (s)he was bitting his fingernails.'

when you spoke REFL bit.3SG the fingernails

b. La Maria badava mentre tu parlaves.
the Maria was-distracted while you spoke
`Maria's attention wandered while you were speaking.'
b. La Maria badava mentre tu parlaves.
the Maria was-distracted while you spoke
`Maria's attention wandered while you were speaking.'
La Maria badava mentre tu parlaves.
the Maria was-distracted while you spoke
Maria's attention wandered while you were speaking.
(i) a. La diferència en passant l' Ebre és brusca.
the difference in passing the Ebre is marked
`Once you cross the Ebre River, the difference is marked.'

the difference in passing the Ebre is marked
`Once you cross the Ebre River, the difference is marked.'

the difference in passing the Ebre is marked
Once you cross the Ebre River, the difference is marked.
b. En arribant a ca Vicenta..., feia la seua paradeta.
in arriving at house Vicenta... did.3SG the his/her exposition
`when he arrived at Vicenta's house, (s)he prepared his/her exposition.'

in arriving at house Vicenta... did.3SG the his/her exposition
`when he arrived at Vicenta's house, (s)he prepared his/her exposition.'

in arriving at house Vicenta...did.3SG the his/her exposition
when he arrived at Vicenta's house, (s)he prepared his/her exposition.
c. Ja aniré en acabant de sopar.
Already will go.1SG in finishing of to-dinner
`I will already go after dinning.'

Already will go.1SG in finishing of to-dinner
`I will already go after dinning.'

Already will go.1SG in finishing of to-dinner

(ii) En después de sopar, eixirem a pegar una volteta.
in after of dinner, will go out.1PL to make a little walk
`After dinning, we will go for a walk.'

in after of dinner, will go out.1PL to make a little walk
`After dinning, we will go for a walk.'

in after of dinner, will go out.1PL to make a little walk

(i) Ho trobaràs a l' entrar, a mà esquerra.
it will-find.2SG at the to-enter at hand left
`You will find it at the entrance, on your left.'

it will-find.2SG at the to-enter at hand left

it will-find.2SG at the to-enter at hand left
You will find it at the entrance, on your left.
(ii) a. Al pujar de l' escala n' hi ha dos.
at-the to-go-up of the stairs of-them there has two
`At the foot of the stairs, there are two of them.'

(4) a. En/a l' arribar la Maria, va començar la reunió.
in/at the to-arrive the Maria began the meeting
`When Mary arrived, the meeting began.'
`Because Mary arrived, the meeting began.'

b. A l' esclatar de l' alba,... vegeren aparèixer una vela.
at the to-arise of the dawn. saw.3PL to-appear a sail
`As dawn broke, they saw a sail appear.'

(i) Ao entrares tu, a Manuela saiu.
in-the to enter.2SG you Manuela left
`When you went in, Manuela left.'

`When you went in, Manuela left.'

(5) a. En/al començar a córrer, en P er e va caur e .
in/a t the to-be g in to r un t he Pere fell-down
`When he began to run, Pere fell down.'

in/at the to-run the Pere fell-down

(6) a. En/al néixer, no va plorar.
in/at the to-be-born not cried.3SG
`When (s)he was born, (s)he didn't cry.'

in/at the to-arrive at home not knew.3SG the news

b. En/al parlar tant, es va quedar sense veu.
in/at the to-talk so much REFL remained.3SG without voice
`Because (s)he talked so much, (s)he lost his voice.'

in/at the to-arrive always at the ten him admonished.3PL
`Because (s)he always arrived at ten, they admonished him.'

in/at the to-arrive late at home not knew.3SG the news

(9) a. En/al vendre's els mobles, en Pere es va entristir.
in/at the to-sell REFL the furniture the Pere REFL became-sad
`When (s)he was selling his furniture, Pere became sad.'
`Because of selling his furniture, Pere became sad.'

b. En/al recitar poemes de Lorca, en Pere es va fer famós.
in/at the to-recite poems of Lorca, the Pere REFL made popular
`When he began to recite some poems by Lorca, Pere became popular.'
`By reciting some poems by Lorca, Pere became popular.'

c. En/al fumar, en Pere es va posar malalt.
in/at the to-smoke the Pere REFL put ill
`As he began to smoke, Pere fell ill.'
`Because of smoking, P ere fell ill.'

`As he began to smoke, Pere fell ill.'

d. En/al cartejar -se, van fer -se bons amics.
in/at the to-correspond-by-letter REFL made.3PL REFL good friends
`Because they corresponded, they became good friends.'

(10) a. En/al ser intel·ligent, va estudiar per físic.
in/at the to-be intelligent studied.3SG for phisicist
`Because he was intelligent, he studied to be a phisicist.'

b. En/al conèixer Itàlia, ens va fer de guia.
in/at the to-know Italy us did.3SG of guide
`Because (s)he knew Italy, (s)he acted as our guide.'

(11) En/al ser deu, vam decidir de canviar de taula.
in/at the to-be ten decided.1PL of to-change of table
`Because there were ten of us, we decided to change tables.'
`When there were ten of us, we decided to change tables.'

tier.item: (12) a. En/al parlar amb el metge del poble, es va adonar
in/at the to-talk with the doctor of the village, REFL realized.3SG
que duia el vestit estripat.
that wore.3SG the clothes torn
`When she was talking with the doctor of the village, she realized that his
clothes were broken.'
(12) a. En/al parlar amb el metge del poble, es va adonar
in/at the to-talk with the doctor of the village, REFL realized.3SG
que duia el vestit estripat.
that wore.3SG the clothes torn

clothes were broken.'

When she was talking with the doctor of the village, she realized that his clothes were broken.
b. En/al parlar amb el metge del poble, va acabar de llevadora.

`Because of her talk with the doctor of the village, she became a midwife.'

(13) a. En/al sortir de la cova, em vaig tranquil·litzar.
in/at the to-leave from the cave REFL became-calm.1SG
`When I left the cave, I became calm.'
`Because I left the cave , I became calm.'

`Because I managed to leave the cave, I became calm.'

`in/at the to-have left from the cave REFL became-calm.1SG
`Because I had left the cave, I became calm.'

(14) a. En/a l' haver de sortir de la cova, es va entrebancar.
in/at the to-have of to-leave from the cave, himself tripped.3SG
`Becaus(s)he had to leave the cave, (s)he tripped.'

va entrebancar.
tripped.3SG
`Because (s)he wanted to leave the cave quickly, he tripped.'

in/at the to-want to-leave quickly from the cave, REFL
va entrebancar.
tripped.3SG

in/at the to-want to-leave quickly from the cave, REFL tripped.3SG

(i) En haver sortit d' escola, anàvem a plaça.
in to-have left of school went.1PL to square
`After leaving the school, we went to the square.'

`After leaving the school, we went to the square.'

in to-have left of school went.1PL to square
After leaving the school, we went to the square.
(15) a. En/a l' anar a escola, podrien veure' t.
in/at the to-go to school would-be-able.3PL to-see you
`When you were going to school, they would be able to see you.'
`Because you go to school, they would be able to see you.'

`Because you go to school, they will see you / they have seen you.'

Because I am not here, things have to take care of themselves.
